void kvtest::AsyncQueue::drainTo ( std::queue< AsyncOperation * > &  out  )  [inline]

Drain some operations to the given queue.

This will remove as many operations from the async queue as can be placed into the output queue given the maximum execution number.

Parameters:
out an output queue ready to receive the ops
